mapper.sql: inkind_id AS "inkindId", inventory_stock_id AS "inventoryStockId", inventory_id AS "inventoryId", detail_id AS "detailId", sku_id AS "skuId", brand_id AS "brandId", customer_id AS "customerId", position_id AS "positionId", anomaly_id AS "anomalyId", number AS "number", lock_status AS "lockStatus", real_number AS "realNumber", status AS "status", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", deptId AS "deptId", display AS "display"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_inventory_stock where 1 = 1
and inventory_stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryStockId},'%')
and inventory_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryId},'%')
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and position_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.positionId},'%')
and anomaly_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.anomalyId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and lock_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.lockStatus},'%')
and real_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.realNumber},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_inventory_stock where 1 = 1
and inventory_stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryStockId},'%')
and inventory_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryId},'%')
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and position_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.positionId},'%')
and anomaly_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.anomalyId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and lock_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.lockStatus},'%')
and real_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.realNumber},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_inventory_stock where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and inventory_stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryStockId},'%')
and inventory_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryId},'%')
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and position_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.positionId},'%')
and anomaly_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.anomalyId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and lock_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.lockStatus},'%')
and real_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.realNumber},'%')
and status = #{paramCondition.status}
and create_user = #{paramCondition.createUser}
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and sku_id in ( select sku_id from goods_sku where display = 1 and sku_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') union select sku_id from goods_sku where display = 1 where spu_id in (select spu_id from goods_spu where display = 1 and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') ) )
order by position_id
asc
desc

select
from daoxin_erp_inventory_stock where 1 = 1
and inventory_stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryStockId},'%')
and inventory_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventoryId},'%')
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and position_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.positionId},'%')
and anomaly_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.anomalyId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and lock_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.lockStatus},'%')
and real_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.realNumber},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
